sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An apology, or, apologiticall answere, made by Father Paule a Venetian, of the order of Serui, vnto the exceptions and obiections of Cardinall Bellarmine, against certaine treatises and resolutions of Iohn Gerson, concerning the force and validitie of excommunication. First published in Italian, and now translated into English. Seene and allowed by publicke authoritie Apologia per le oppositioni fatte dall' illustrissimo & reverendissimo signor cardinale Bellarminio alli trattati, et risolutioni di Gio. Gersone. English Sarpi, Paolo, 1552-1623.
[2], 68, 65-72 p., 73-103, [1] leaves
Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for William Welby, and are to be sold at the signe of the Gray-hound in Paules Church-yard, London : 1607.
A translation of: Sarpi, Paolo. Apologia per le oppositioni fatte dall' illustrissimo & reverendissimo signor cardinale Bellarminio alli trattati, et risolutioni di Gio. Gersone. A reply to: Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo. Risposta a due libretti. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: Frier Paulo's defence of Gerson against Bellarmine. Quire I is probably a cancel. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library. Title page mutilated and illegible.
=======
An apology, or, apologiticall answere, made by Father Paule a Venetian, of the order of Serui, vnto the exceptions and obiections of Cardinall Bellarmine, against certaine treatises and resolutions of Iohn Gerson, concerning the force and validitie of excommunication. First published in Italian, and now translated into English. Seene and allowed by publicke authoritie Apologia per le oppositioni fatte dall' illustrissimo & reverendissimo signor cardinale Bellarminio alli trattati, et risolutioni di Gio. Gersone. English Sarpi, Paolo, 1552-1623.
[2], 68, 65-72 p., 73-103, [1] leaves
Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for William Welby, and are to be sold at the signe of the Gray-hound in Paules Church-yard, London : 1607.
A translation of: Sarpi, Paolo. Apologia per le oppositioni fatte dall' illustrissimo & reverendissimo signor cardinale Bellarminio alli trattati, et risolutioni di Gio. Gersone. A reply to: Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo. Risposta a due libretti. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: Frier Paulo's defence of Gerson against Bellarmine. Quire I is probably a cancel. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library. Title page mutilated and illegible.
William Welby
N[icholas] O[kes]
the signe of the Gray-hound in Paules Church-yard
